title.rendered: DraftKings Kentucky Promo Code: Get $200 Bonus

content.rendered:
Get $200 in Bonus Bets when signing up in Kentucky!

Grab the Offer Now!

Disclaimer

Kentucky sports betting begins on September 28, but before you place your first wager, Winners and Whiners has partnered with our DraftKings Kentucky Promo Code to provide sports fans in Kentucky with a very special offer to jump into the action.

The DraftKings first-time deposit bonus is very easy to understand. They are offering a $200 bonus bet for new users you make a qualifying bet of at least $5. 

To be eligible for the promotion, new Sportsbook customers must:

  1. Not have previously created a DraftKings Sportsbook account
  2. Be physically located in the Eligible Jurisdiction and obtained the minimum age requirements, and
  3. Successfully sign up for a new DraftKings Sportsbook account during the Promotional Period. Upon completion of the promotional requirements, eligible customers will receive $200 in Bonus Bets to use on the first date and time that DraftKings is permitted to offer sports betting in Kentucky. Bonus Bets paid as eight (8) $25 Bonus Bets.

DraftKings Kentucky Promo Code: Get $200 in Bonus Bets!

The winnings from the first-time deposit bonus can be withdrawn as soon as the bonus bet is settled. This is a very quick turnaround time, and it is one of the best features of this bonus offer.

 

 Get $200 in Bonus Bets when signing up in Kentucky!

Grab the Offer Now!

Disclaimer
  • With this special offer, you can bet on the Cincinnati Bengals and all the other NFL teams. You can also place wagers on all MLB teams, including the Cincinnati Reds.
  • The Kentucky Wildcats, Louisville Cardinals, and Western Kentucky Hilltoppers are all also in line for exciting seasons in both College Football and College Hoops!
  • But you can bet on so much more than just the NFL, MLB, NBA, and college sports. Draft Kings will let you jump in the MLS action as well, including FC Cincinnati games!

DraftKings Kentucky Offer Launches Just In Time For The NFL Season

With our DraftKings promo code, Kentucky sports lovers betting on any NFL action can get Get $200 in Bonus Bets deal when you click ➡️ here ⬅️. With Week 1 of the 2023 NFL season nearly upon us, football fans will have all sorts of opportunities to make use of this DraftKings promo code offer in the near future.

Get $200 in Bonus Bets when signing up in Kentucky!

Grab the Offer Now!

Disclaimer

DraftKings has a strong reputation in the sports gambling world and is an official sports betting partner of the NFL, NBA, NHL, PGA Tour, and UFC.

The mobile app is very user-friendly; you can begin betting instantly, and all types of bets are easy to find. They always offer promotions for new users.

Kentucky sports lovers betting on any NFL action can get $200 in Bonus Bets deal when you click ➡️ here ⬅️. With Week 1 of the 2023 NFL season nearly upon us, football fans will have all sorts of opportunities to make use of this DraftKings promo code offer in the near future.

 

Here are some of the key matchups you maybe interested in betting on this week:

College Football:

  • Murray State at Louisville
    Date: Thursday, Sept. 7, 2023
    Time: 7:30pm EST
  • Youngstown State at Ohio State 
    Date: Saturday, Sept. 9, 2023
    Time: Noon PM EST
  • Eastern Kentucky at Kentucky
    Date: Saturday, Sept. 9, 2023
    Time: 3:00 PM EST
  • Texas at Alabama
    Date: Saturday, Sept. 9, 2023
    Time: 7:00 PM EST

NFL:

  • Detroit Lions at Kansas City Chiefs
    Date: Thursday, Sept. 7, 2023
    Time: 8:20 PM EST
  • Cincinnati Bengals at Cleveland Browns
    Date: Saturday, Sept. 9, 2023
    Time: 1 PM EST

Pre-Registration Unlocks $200 in Bonus Bets at DraftKings Kentucky

New Kentucky players can claim $200 in Bonus Bets offer for any NFL game without needing a DraftKings promo code. Simply click ➡️ here ⬅️ to get started.

Winners and Whiners offers all the best sportsbook promos, latest sports gambling news, and predictions for all games from the major sports. Being a profitable sports gambler does not happen by chance, it takes research, insight, and diligence to find the best odds and resources to become successful.  You can check out some of the hottest cappers in the industry here.

 

Disclaimer: Gambling problem? Call 1-800-GAMBLER. 18+. Physically present in KY. Eligibility restrictions apply. Subject to regulatory and licensing requirements. New customers who successfully sign-up will receive $200 in Bonus Bets on launch day. Bonus Bets expire 7 days (168 hours) after being awarded. Bonus bets must be wagered 1x and stake is not included in winnings. See terms at http://draftkings.com/sportsbook/ky
